mapper.sql: spu_id, chanpin_name, erji_id, pinpai_id, jianjie, xiangqing
mapper.select:
select
from spu
spu_id = #{spuId} AND
chanpin_name = #{chanpinName} AND
erji_id = #{erjiId} AND
pinpai_id = #{pinpaiId} AND
jianjie = #{jianjie} AND
xiangqing = #{xiangqing} AND
mapper.insert:
insert into spu
spu_id,
chanpin_name,
erji_id,
pinpai_id,
jianjie,
xiangqing,
#{spuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chanpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{erjiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pinpaiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jianjie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xiangqing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update spu
chanpin_name = #{chanpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erji_id = #{erjiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinpai_id = #{pinpaiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jianjie = #{jianjie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xiangqing = #{xiangqing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update spu set chanpin_name = #{chanpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, erji_id = #{erjiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinpai_id = #{pinpaiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jianjie = #{jianjie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xiangqing = #{xiangqing,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
